tool_description: Calculates geographic distances between properties using coordinates and provides proximity rankings for comparable analysis.

comparable_latitudes.description: Array of latitude coordinates for comparable properties

comparable_longitudes.description: Array of longitude coordinates for comparable properties

error_messages: Coordinate array mismatch: comparable_latitudes and comparable_longitudes must have the same number of elements.
Invalid coordinates: All latitude values must be between -90 and 90, longitude values between -180 and 180.
Empty coordinate arrays: At least one comparable property coordinate pair must be provided.
usage: Provide subject property coordinates and arrays of comparable property coordinates. Returns calculated distances and proximity rankings for valuation weighting.

distances_miles.description: Distance in miles from subject to each comparable property

average_distance.description: Average distance to all comparable properties
